content.description:
Facilitates Gridlock
 Facilitates Action

content.question: Which of the following is the most accurate comparison of the processes that generally facilitate gridlock and those that facilitate governmental action?

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Compare political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
